name: Fluffy Invaders
description:
You are the Roomba for rich grandparents who live a castle. However, the couple left the door open, and wild dogs have stormed into their home. They shed excessively, and you must vacuum all of the fluff and collect the key to shut the door. To win, you must do both of these objectives, and arrive at the door. Fullscreen is not optimized.

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement
